com.software.reuze

Interface gb_i_Mesh

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    gb_TriangleMesh, gb_WETriangleMesh

    public interface gb_i_Mesh
    Common interface for 3D (triangle) mesh containers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a, gb_Vector3 b, gb_Vector3 c)
      Adds the given 3 points as triangle face to the mesh.
      gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a, gb_Vector3 b, gb_Vector3 c, ga_Vector2 uvA, ga_Vector2 uvB, ga_Vector2 uvC)
      Adds the given 3 points as triangle face to the mesh and assigns the given texture coordinates to each vertex.
      gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a, gb_Vector3 b, gb_Vector3 c, gb_Vector3 n) 
      gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a, gb_Vector3 b, gb_Vector3 c, gb_Vector3 n, ga_Vector2 uvA, ga_Vector2 uvB, ga_Vector2 uvC) 
      gb_i_Mesh addMesh(gb_i_Mesh mesh) 
      gb_AABB3 center(gb_Vector3 origin)
      Centers the mesh around the given pivot point (the centroid of its AABB).
      gb_i_Mesh clear()
      Clears all counters, and vertex & face buffers.
      gb_Vector3 computeCentroid()
      Computes the mesh centroid, the average position of all vertices.
      gb_i_Mesh computeFaceNormals()
      Re-calculates all face normals.
      gb_i_Mesh computeVertexNormals()
      Computes the smooth vertex normals for the entire mesh.
      gb_i_Mesh faceOutwards()
      Changes the vertex order of faces such that their normal is facing away from the mesh centroid.
      gb_i_Mesh flipVertexOrder()
      Flips the vertex ordering between clockwise and anti-clockwise.
      gb_i_Mesh flipYAxis()
      Flips all vertices along the Y axis and reverses the vertex ordering of all faces to compensate and keep the direction of normals intact.
      gb_AABB3 getBoundingBox()
      Computes & returns the axis-aligned bounding box of the mesh.
      gb_Sphere getBoundingSphere()
      Computes & returns the bounding sphere of the mesh.
      gb_Vector3Id getClosestVertexToPoint(gb_Vector3 p) 
      Collection<gb_TriangleFace> getFaces() 
      int getNumFaces()
      Returns the number of triangles used.
      int getNumVertices()
      Returns the number of actual vertices used (unique vertices).
      Collection<gb_Vector3Id> getVertices() 
      gb_i_Mesh init(String name, int numV, int numF) 
      gb_i_Mesh setName(String name) 

    • Method Detail

      • addFace

        gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a,
                gb_Vector3 b,
                gb_Vector3 c)
        Adds the given 3 points as triangle face to the mesh. The assumed vertex order is anti-clockwise.
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        c -

      • addFace

        gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a,
                gb_Vector3 b,
                gb_Vector3 c,
                ga_Vector2 uvA,
                ga_Vector2 uvB,
                ga_Vector2 uvC)
        Adds the given 3 points as triangle face to the mesh and assigns the given texture coordinates to each vertex. The assumed vertex order is anti-clockwise.
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        c -
        uvA -
        uvB -
        uvC -
        Returns:
        itself

      • addFace

        gb_i_Mesh addFace(gb_Vector3 a,
                gb_Vector3 b,
                gb_Vector3 c,
                gb_Vector3 n)

                ga_Vector2 uvA,

      • addMesh

        gb_i_Mesh addMesh(gb_i_Mesh mesh)

      • center

        gb_AABB3 center(gb_Vector3 origin)
        Centers the mesh around the given pivot point (the centroid of its AABB). Method also updates & returns the new bounding box.
        Parameters:
        origin - new centroid or null (defaults to {0,0,0})

      • clear

        gb_i_Mesh clear()
        Clears all counters, and vertex & face buffers.

      • computeCentroid

        gb_Vector3 computeCentroid()
        Computes the mesh centroid, the average position of all vertices.
        Returns:
        center point

      • computeFaceNormals

        gb_i_Mesh computeFaceNormals()
        Re-calculates all face normals.

      • computeVertexNormals

        gb_i_Mesh computeVertexNormals()
        Computes the smooth vertex normals for the entire mesh.
        Returns:
        itself

      • faceOutwards

        gb_i_Mesh faceOutwards()
        Changes the vertex order of faces such that their normal is facing away from the mesh centroid.
        Returns:
        itself

      • flipVertexOrder

        gb_i_Mesh flipVertexOrder()
        Flips the vertex ordering between clockwise and anti-clockwise. Face normals are updated automatically too.
        Returns:
        itself

      • flipYAxis

        gb_i_Mesh flipYAxis()
        Flips all vertices along the Y axis and reverses the vertex ordering of all faces to compensate and keep the direction of normals intact.
        Returns:
        itself

      • getBoundingBox

        gb_AABB3 getBoundingBox()
        Computes & returns the axis-aligned bounding box of the mesh.
        Returns:
        bounding box

      • getBoundingSphere

        gb_Sphere getBoundingSphere()
        Computes & returns the bounding sphere of the mesh. The origin of the sphere is the mesh's centroid.
        Returns:
        bounding sphere

      • getClosestVertexToPoint

        gb_Vector3Id getClosestVertexToPoint(gb_Vector3 p)

      • getFaces

        Collection<gb_TriangleFace> getFaces()

      • getNumFaces

        int getNumFaces()
        Returns the number of triangles used.
        Returns:
        face count

      • getNumVertices

        int getNumVertices()
        Returns the number of actual vertices used (unique vertices).
        Returns:
        vertex count

      • getVertices

        Collection<gb_Vector3Id> getVertices()

      • init

        gb_i_Mesh init(String name,
             int numV,
             int numF)

      • setName

        gb_i_Mesh setName(String name)
